sentences.sentence: By his command, a repast was brought such as Tom had never encountered before except in books.
sentences.translation: 在他的命令下，一顿饭送来了，这样的饭汤姆只在书本上见过。

sentences.sentence: Well then, good luck to the repast!
The guests partook of a luxurious repast in the banqueting hall.
sentences.translation: 贵宾们在大餐厅参加一个宴会。
